Name: Magic defense
About the game: It's time for real battles! Our wealth is in great danger, which we have not faced before. A horde of greedy trolls and other magical characters want to take away all our gold! Build a defense and stop them immediately! Do you think it will be easy? Are you sure the enemy is weaker than you? As if not so: you will need a lot of tactics to defeat a cunning opponent. One way or another, the range of available turrets will open up the widest tactical possibilities for you. And carefully drawn graphics and excellent special effects just won't let you take your eyes off the screen. All aspects of the game are perfectly balanced: the characteristics of the towers, the strength of the enemies-you will definitely not get bored from the excessive ease of the gameplay. Feel the real excitement of the battles! Upgrade your army, build as many defenses as possible, and develop your own tactics to protect your wealth!
